EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Time crunched? If you consider the 10 minutes it takes to read this analyst report to be a luxury of time you don’t have, you’re not alone. So we’ll make it worth your while.
Too good to be true? Automation, Economics, and Efficiency – all benefits of IaaS. However, with these benefits come a number of challenges, such as constant change and fluctuation driven by interdependencies and complexity in the IT stack.
And who has time to manage the ever-increasing number of mission-critical applications running in the cloud?
Not you, that’s for sure. Take a look at this short report <http://bit.ly/15OhkdZ> from Neovise and learn about a new approach from VMTurbo that enables effective management so that you can take advantage of all the benefits of cloud technology.
Best regards,
The VMTurbo Team Headed to VMworld 2013? Stop by and see us at booth #611.
